lead_paragraph: There is no economic case for breaking up the United Kingdom, British Prime Minister Theresa May said on Friday, in a speech attacking Scottish nationalists for being "obsessed" with independence.
snippet: There is no economic case for breaking up the United Kingdom, British Prime Minister Theresa May said on Friday, in a speech attacking Scottish nationalists for being "obsessed" with independence....

headline.main: WH Defends Pence's Use of Private Email While Governor
headline.print_headline: WH Defends Pence's Use of Private Email While Governor
